description:
Our Kick-off has been set on Tuesday 7 February at Betagroup Coworking Brussels.

We will present a general overview of the following financial topics, relevant for startup's:

setting up a company & getting yourself paid

funding

accounting charges & investments

accounting revenues

Profit & Loss (P&L) Accounts

Balance sheet

Cash!

 

The purpose of this interactive kick-off is to provide you an overview of these different financial topics, so that you gain some global financial knowledge, and how it relates to your own startup situation.

The following meetings will be on specific topics as selected by the members.

 

Thanks to BetaGroup Coworking Brussels (http://coworking.betagroup.be) & ICAB (http://www.icabrussel.be/) for the venue sponsoring of this event.
name: Kick-off

venue.name: ICAB Business & Technology Incubator
venue.address_1: Witte Patersstraat 4 rue de Peres Blancs

name: Valuation - workshop

description:
During this 1:15 evening session, we will focus on the top 5 reasons why an investor will NOT invest in your startup (i.e. the biggest mistakes by startups), with real life (but anonymous) cases & examples.

 

Team

Business model

Scalability

ROI (return on investment)

Exit strategy

 

We shall spend approx. 15 minutes for each reason, whereby the scalability issue, will be presented by Vladimir Blagojevic of GrantSnap.

After the session, a network drink will be offered to the participants.

(P.S. This event will be free for the participants)

18:00 Opening doors

18:30 Start session

19:45 Network drink


 

If you have any questions or remarks, do not hesitate to contact us.

 

Xavier, Vladimir & Martin

venue.name: ICAB Business & Technology Incubator
venue.address_1: Witte Patersstraat 4 rue de Peres Blancs

name: The top 5 reasons why an investor will NOT invest in your startup (free event)

description:
Start or continue your startup activities in 2013 by gaining some relevant financial concepts during a 1½ hour interactive session, where we shall openly talk about the following topics:

* Company setup

* Accounting

* Financial Plan

* Funding your startup

* Valuation/Dilution


As always during our sessions, feel free to interrupt and ask questions or give remarks.


A network drink is offered at the end of the session, whereby we will both be present to answer any questions you might have.

 

Xavier & Martin
name: The 5 basic financial concepts every entrepreneur should know (free kick-off)

description:
How to valuate your company?

After an introduction on valuation methods by Xavier and Martin, get the point of view from Capricorn Venture Partners, a leading Belgian Venture Capitalist (VC) - www.capricorn.be.

This will be followed by an open Q&A session and afterwards a network drink, kindly offered by Capricorn Venture Partners.

 

If you have any questions or comments, do not hesitate to contact us.

 

Xavier & Martin

venue.name: ICAB Business & Technology Incubator
venue.address_1: Witte Patersstraat 4 rue de Peres Blancs

name: How to valuate your company, with Capricorn Venture Partners (free event)

description:
Present your startup & get 1:1 feedback from marketing, technical and financial professionals (a/o Capricorn Venture Partners).

Proposed format:

10 min pitch + 10 min Q&A + 10 min feedback

 

1/ Please go to www.FinanceForStartups.be for the registration guidelines & form

2/ Send your answers to [masked] and [masked] by June 23rd at the latest

3/ By Monday June 24th, we will inform you if you are selected, as well as your allocated time-slot.

 

Please participate only if you are free and available on June 27th-thanks.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

Xavier & Martin

description:
During this meetup, Guillaume Desclée from <a>MyMicroInvest</a> and Claire Munck from BeAngels will share with you tips and tricks to make a good and relevant presentation to investors.


@ Atelier des Tanneurs
name: How to present your project to investors?
